pkgmetadata.longdescription: Person-Centered Analysis // Provides an easy-to-use yet adaptable set of tools to conduct person-center analysis using a two-step (hierarchical and iterative) cluster analysis as described in Bergman El-Khouri (1999) DOI:10.1002/(SICI)1521-4036(199910)41:6%3C753::AID- BIMJ753%3E3.0.CO;2-K. While person-centered analysis is increasingly common in psychology, education, and related fields, carrying it out is challenging.
